title: Changes that shift investment demand right

content.prompt: All of the following changes will shift the investment demand curve to the right EXCEPT

choices.label: a decrease in the corporate income tax rate
an increase in the productivity of new capital goods
an increase in the real interest rate
an increase in real gross domestic product

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
